profile_summary:
As a versatile **Full Stack Developer** with 8 years of experience, I excel in delivering high-performance solutions in decentralized systems leveraging my extensive knowledge of **Solidity**, **EVM chains**, and **Smart contract architecture**. My technical expertise includes **cryptography**, consensus mechanisms, and vulnerability hunting, reinforced by hands-on experience with tools such as **MythX**, **Slither**, **Hardhat**, and **Foundry**.

I have a proven track record in implementing and consulting on protocols related to **DeFi**, **tokenomics**, and cross-chain bridging, ensuring robust and secure applications that align with compliance standards. My background in cloud services spans **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, enabling seamless API integration and upgradability.

In addition to my technical skills, I’m committed to continuous learning and effective client communication, equipped to conduct risk assessments and contribute to the growth of decentralized applications through well-planned multi-chain deployments. I also bring extensive knowledge of **CI/CD automation**, microservices architecture, and machine learning integrations, enabling me to drive innovation and efficiency in all projects.
